headline.main: DECLARATION NEAR; Congress Requested to Act Against Hungary, Bulgaria, Rumania

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 2 -- President Roosevelt asked Congress today to recognize existence of a state of war with Rumania, Bulgaria and Hungary. Swift and unanimous approval in the House of Representatives tomorrow and in the Senate Thursday was predicted.
abstract: U S plans for war declarations on Bulgaria, Hungary and Rumania seen as gesture to USSR

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
